name: Ripper Ribbit
overview:
Ripper Ribbit © 1997 LAI Games.

The theme is to catch as many insects as you can before time runs out.

Your frog "Ripper Ribbit" is hungry and will eat just about any knid of bug that crawls, slithers, or flies by. But don't let him eat the spiders! They bite back!
Features:
Easy and intuitive game play that's fun for the whole family
Comical bugs with animated reactions when caught
Enchanting sound effects add to the fun
